name: Coro Market
description:
Shopping always makes people nervous. But when some virus comes into the dance, it starts to get very very messy.

Choose your character and be the one who will buy the most products. But be careful ! Other player may not let you do what you want...

You will have to take the most amount of product without forgeting to catch sales and sold out products ! But be careful of the infected ones.
Will you find all you need and more to be ready for the lockdown ? Answer is now in your hands !

Coro Market is an arcade, multiplayer and online game. Create a game, and let three of your friends join you in the most epic supermarket battle of all time. Fight them to get what you truly deserve as a honest consumer.

And if you need some teammates to play it or if you want to talk with us, join us on Discord !
https://discord.gg/xW5TnH2

*** CAUTION : Note that this is only the alpha of the project
More content and android build will come soon ! ***
